Description:
Job DescriptionMain Responsibilities:Develop, build, configure and unit test solutions from low level designs
Write clean, efficient, and well-documented code
Ensure that solutions meet requirements outlined in the design documentation
Perform all work to agreed time, cost and quality constraints
Ensure that developed solutions are peer reviewed and formally documented.
Unit test solutions to ensure they meet quality standard
Work with external partners to establish AS2 or SFTP connectivity
Work with internal application teams to establish connectivity using Connect Direct or SFTP or File System
Familiarity with UNIX scripts, database technologies such as ORACLE or MSSQL
Knowledge of EDI standards and SAP IDOCs
Work on EDI Projects and EDI Operations using DevOps model
Familiarity with ticketing tool such as Service Now
Familiarity with Scrum and Sprint
Flexible enough to take up weekend support activities as required
Collaborate with regional teams
Ready to take up any challenging assignments such as owning platform maintenance and activities
Ensure quality through unit and functional test implementation and execution.
Participate in and contribute to all phases of the SDLC, including working with DevOps teams to develop end-to-end testing of the solutions and ensure proper monitoring and alerting of the solution.
Collaborate cross-functionally with technical/non-technical stakeholders to gather and understand the requirements
Work with Business Analysts/Project Manager /IT Leads and other stakeholders to understand requirements and help the team establish a technical approach to delivering features that is in line with architectural norms and best practice
Knowledge of Sterling B2B Integrator is desirableStandard Minimum RequirementsEducation: Min Education: Bachelorâ€™s degree in Computer ScienceExperience:1+ years of experience in IT desirableLanguageThe ability to read, write, understand, and communicate in English fluently.
